original_text: save others by snatching them out of the fire; to others show mercy with fear, hating even the garment stained by the flesh.
korean_text: 또 어떤 자를 불에서 끌어내어 구원하라 또 어떤 자를 그 육체로 더럽힌 옷까지도 미워하되 두려움으로 긍휼히 여기라

sentences.original_text: save others by snatching them out of the fire
to others show mercy with fear
hating even the garment stained by the flesh.
